name: api-client-service
description: Reference project using the Nanolink API

scripts.showdoc: docker run -d --rm --name acsdoc -p 8080:80 acsdoc && start http://localhost:8080
scripts.doc: docker build -t acsdoc -f .\Dockerfile.doc  . && docker run -d --rm --name acsdoc -p 8080:80 acsdoc && start http://localhost:8080

author: Mogens Bak Nielsen
